00011 
00012 #include "midas.h"

00017 /**dox***************************************************************/
00018 /** @file alarm.c
00019 The Midas Alarm file
00020 */

00022 /** @defgroup alfunctioncode Midas Alarm Functions (al_xxx)

00033 /********************************************************************\
00034 *                                                                    *
00035 *                     Alarm functions                                *
00036 *                                                                    *
00037 \********************************************************************/
00038 
00039 /********************************************************************/
00040 BOOL al_evaluate_condition(const char *condition, char *value)
00041 {
00042    HNDLE hDB, hkey;
00043    int i, j, idx1, idx2, idx, size, state;
00044    KEY key;
00045    double value1, value2;
00046    char value1_str[256], value2_str[256], str[256], op[3], function[80];
00047    char data[10000];
00048    DWORD dtime;
00049 
00050    strcpy(str, condition);
00051    op[1] = op[2] = 0;
00052    value1 = value2 = 0;
00053    idx1 = idx2 = 0;
00054 
00055    /* find value and operator */
00056    for (i = strlen(str) - 1; i > 0; i--)
00057       if (strchr("<>=!&", str[i]) != NULL)
00058          break;
00059    op[0] = str[i];
00060    for (j = 1; str[i + j] == ' '; j++);
00061    strlcpy(value2_str, str + i + j, sizeof(value2_str));
00062    value2 = atof(value2_str);
00063    str[i] = 0;
00064 
00065    if (i > 0 && strchr("<>=!&", str[i - 1])) {
00066       op[1] = op[0];
00067       op[0] = str[--i];
00068       str[i] = 0;
00069    }
00070 
00071    i--;
00072    while (i > 0 && str[i] == ' ')
00073       i--;
00074    str[i + 1] = 0;
00075 
00076    /* check if function */
00077    function[0] = 0;
00078    if (str[i] == ')') {
00079       str[i--] = 0;
00080       if (strchr(str, '(')) {
00081          *strchr(str, '(') = 0;
00082          strcpy(function, str);
00083          for (i = strlen(str) + 1, j = 0; str[i]; i++, j++)
00084             str[j] = str[i];
00085          str[j] = 0;
00086          i = j - 1;
00087       }
00088    }
00089 
00090    /* find key */
00091    if (str[i] == ']') {
00092       str[i--] = 0;
00093       if (str[i] == '*') {
00094          idx1 = -1;
00095          while (i > 0 && str[i] != '[')
00096             i--;
00097          str[i] = 0;
00098       } else if (strchr(str, '[') &&
00099                  strchr(strchr(str, '['), '-')) {
00100          while (i > 0 && isdigit(str[i]))
00101             i--;
00102          idx2 = atoi(str + i + 1);
00103          while (i > 0 && str[i] != '[')
00104             i--;
00105          idx1 = atoi(str + i + 1);
00106          str[i] = 0;
00107       } else {
00108          while (i > 0 && isdigit(str[i]))
00109             i--;
00110          idx1 = idx2 = atoi(str + i + 1);
00111          str[i] = 0;
00112       }
00113    }
00114 
00115    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00116    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkey);
00117    if (!hkey) {
00118       cm_msg(MERROR, "al_evaluate_condition", "Cannot find key %s to evaluate alarm condition", str);
00119       if (value)
00120          strcpy(value, "unknown");
00121       return FALSE;
00122    }
00123    db_get_key(hDB, hkey, &key);
00124 
00125    if (idx1 < 0) {
00126       idx1 = 0;
00127       idx2 = key.num_values-1;
00128    }
00129 
00130    for (idx=idx1; idx<=idx2 ; idx++) {
00131       
00132       if (equal_ustring(function, "access")) {
00133          /* check key access time */
00134          db_get_key_time(hDB, hkey, &dtime);
00135          sprintf(value1_str, "%d", dtime);
00136          value1 = atof(value1_str);
00137       } else if (equal_ustring(function, "access_running")) {
00138          /* check key access time if running */
00139          db_get_key_time(hDB, hkey, &dtime);
00140          sprintf(value1_str, "%d", dtime);
00141          size = sizeof(state);
00142          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &state, &size, TID_INT, FALSE);
00143          if (state != STATE_RUNNING)
00144             strcpy(value1_str, "0");
00145          value1 = atof(value1_str);
00146       } else {
00147          /* get key data and convert to double */
00148          db_get_key(hDB, hkey, &key);
00149          size = sizeof(data);
00150          db_get_data_index(hDB, hkey, data, &size, idx, key.type);
00151          db_sprintf(value1_str, data, size, 0, key.type);
00152          value1 = atof(value1_str);
00153       }
00154 
00155       /* convert boolean values to integers */
00156       if (key.type == TID_BOOL) {
00157          value1 = (value1_str[0] == 'Y' || value1_str[0] == 'y' || value1_str[0] == '1');
00158          value2 = (value2_str[0] == 'Y' || value2_str[0] == 'y' || value2_str[0] == '1');
00159       }
00160 
00161       /* return value */
00162       if (value)
00163          strcpy(value, value1_str);
00164 
00165       /* now do logical operation */
00166       if (strcmp(op, "=") == 0)
00167          if (value1 == value2) return TRUE;
00168       if (strcmp(op, "==") == 0)
00169          if (value1 == value2) return TRUE;
00170       if (strcmp(op, "!=") == 0)
00171          if (value1 != value2) return TRUE;
00172       if (strcmp(op, "<") == 0)
00173          if (value1 < value2) return TRUE;
00174       if (strcmp(op, ">") == 0)
00175          if (value1 > value2) return TRUE;
00176       if (strcmp(op, "<=") == 0)
00177          if (value1 <= value2) return TRUE;
00178       if (strcmp(op, ">=") == 0)
00179          if (value1 >= value2) return TRUE;
00180       if (strcmp(op, "&") == 0)
00181          if (((unsigned int)value1 & (unsigned int)value2) > 0) return TRUE;
00182    }
00183 
00184    return FALSE;
00185 }

00188 #endif                          /* DOXYGEN_SHOULD_SKIP_THIS */

00190 /********************************************************************/
00191 /**
00192 Trigger a certain alarm.
00193 \code  ...
00194   lazy.alarm[0] = 0;
00195   size = sizeof(lazy.alarm);
00196   db_get_value(hDB, pLch->hKey, "Settings/Alarm Class", lazy.alarm, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00197 
00198   // trigger alarm if defined
00199   if (lazy.alarm[0])
00200     al_trigger_alarm("Tape", "Tape full...load new one!", lazy.alarm, "Tape full", AT_INTERNAL);
00201   ...
00202 \endcode
00203 @param alarm_name Alarm name, defined in /alarms/alarms
00204 @param alarm_message Optional message which goes with alarm
00205 @param default_class If alarm is not yet defined under
00206                     /alarms/alarms/<alarm_name>, a new one
00207                     is created and this default class is used.
00208 @param cond_str String displayed in alarm condition
00209 @param type Alarm type, one of AT_xxx
00210 @return AL_SUCCESS, AL_INVALID_NAME
00211 */
00212 INT al_trigger_alarm(const char *alarm_name, const char *alarm_message, const char *default_class, const char *cond_str, INT type)
00213 {
00214    if (rpc_is_remote())
00215       return rpc_call(RPC_AL_TRIGGER_ALARM, alarm_name, alarm_message, default_class, cond_str, type);
00216 
00217 #ifdef LOCAL_ROUTINES
00218    {
00219       int status, size;
00220       HNDLE hDB, hkeyalarm, hkey;
00221       char str[256];
00222       ALARM a;
00223       BOOL flag;
00224       ALARM_ODB_STR(alarm_odb_str);
00225 
00226       cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00227 
00228       /* check online mode */
00229       flag = TRUE;
00230       size = sizeof(flag);
00231       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Online Mode", &flag, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00232       if (!flag)
00233          return AL_SUCCESS;
00234 
00235       /* find alarm */
00236       sprintf(str, "/Alarms/Alarms/%s", alarm_name);
00237       db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkeyalarm);
00238       if (!hkeyalarm) {
00239          /* alarm must be an internal analyzer alarm, so create a default alarm */
00240          status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, str, strcomb(alarm_odb_str));
00241          db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkeyalarm);
00242          if (!hkeyalarm) {
00243             cm_msg(MERROR, "al_trigger_alarm", "Cannot create alarm record");
00244             return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00245          }
00246 
00247          if (default_class && default_class[0])
00248             db_set_value(hDB, hkeyalarm, "Alarm Class", default_class, 32, 1, TID_STRING);
00249          status = TRUE;
00250          db_set_value(hDB, hkeyalarm, "Active", &status, sizeof(status), 1, TID_BOOL);
00251       }
00252 
00253       /* set parameters for internal alarms */
00254       if (type != AT_EVALUATED && type != AT_PERIODIC) {
00255          db_set_value(hDB, hkeyalarm, "Type", &type, sizeof(INT), 1, TID_INT);
00256          strcpy(str, cond_str);
00257          db_set_value(hDB, hkeyalarm, "Condition", str, 256, 1, TID_STRING);
00258       }
00259 
00260       size = sizeof(a);
00261       status = db_get_record(hDB, hkeyalarm, &a, &size, 0);
00262       if (status != DB_SUCCESS || a.type < 1 || a.type > AT_LAST) {
00263          /* make sure alarm record has right structure */
00264          db_check_record(hDB, hkeyalarm, "", strcomb(alarm_odb_str), TRUE);
00265 
00266          size = sizeof(a);
00267          status = db_get_record(hDB, hkeyalarm, &a, &size, 0);
00268          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00269             cm_msg(MERROR, "al_trigger_alarm", "Cannot get alarm record");
00270             return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00271          }
00272       }
00273 
00274       /* if internal alarm, check if active and check interval */
00275       if (a.type != AT_EVALUATED && a.type != AT_PERIODIC) {
00276          /* check global alarm flag */
00277          flag = TRUE;
00278          size = sizeof(flag);
00279          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarm system active", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00280          if (!flag)
00281             return AL_SUCCESS;
00282 
00283          if (!a.active)
00284             return AL_SUCCESS;
00285 
00286          if ((INT) ss_time() - (INT) a.checked_last < a.check_interval)
00287             return AL_SUCCESS;
00288 
00289          /* now the alarm will be triggered, so save time */
00290          a.checked_last = ss_time();
00291       }
00292 
00293       /* write back alarm message for internal alarms */
00294       if (a.type != AT_EVALUATED && a.type != AT_PERIODIC) {
00295          strncpy(a.alarm_message, alarm_message, 79);
00296          a.alarm_message[79] = 0;
00297       }
00298 
00299       /* now trigger alarm class defined in this alarm */
00300       if (a.alarm_class[0])
00301          al_trigger_class(a.alarm_class, alarm_message, a.triggered > 0);
00302 
00303       /* check for and trigger "All" class */
00304       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Classes/All", &hkey) == DB_SUCCESS)
00305          al_trigger_class("All", alarm_message, a.triggered > 0);
00306 
00307       /* signal alarm being triggered */
00308       cm_asctime(str, sizeof(str));
00309 
00310       if (!a.triggered)
00311          strcpy(a.time_triggered_first, str);
00312 
00313       a.triggered++;
00314       strcpy(a.time_triggered_last, str);
00315 
00316       a.checked_last = ss_time();
00317 
00318       status = db_set_record(hDB, hkeyalarm, &a, sizeof(a), 0);
00319       if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00320          cm_msg(MERROR, "al_trigger_alarm", "Cannot update alarm record");
00321          return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00322       }
00323 
00324    }
00325 #endif                          /* LOCAL_ROUTINES */
00326 
00327    return AL_SUCCESS;
00328 }

00330 /**dox***************************************************************/
00331 #ifndef DOXYGEN_SHOULD_SKIP_THIS
00332 
00333 /********************************************************************/
00334 INT al_trigger_class(const char *alarm_class, const char *alarm_message, BOOL first)
00335 /********************************************************************\
00336 
00337   Routine: al_trigger_class
00338 
00339   Purpose: Trigger a certain alarm class
00340 
00341   Input:
00342     char   *alarm_class     Alarm class, must be defined in
00343                             /alarms/classes
00344     char   *alarm_message   Optional message which goes with alarm
00345     BOOL   first            TRUE if alarm is triggered first time
00346                             (used for elog)
00347 
00348   Output:
00349 
00350   Function value:
00351     AL_INVALID_NAME         Alarm class not defined
00352     AL_SUCCESS              Successful completion
00353 
00354 \********************************************************************/
00355 {
00356    int status, size, state;
00357    HNDLE hDB, hkeyclass;
00358    char str[256], command[256], tag[32], url[256];
00359    ALARM_CLASS ac;
00360    DWORD now = ss_time();
00361 
00362    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00363 
00364    /* get alarm class */
00365    sprintf(str, "/Alarms/Classes/%s", alarm_class);
00366    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkeyclass);
00367    if (!hkeyclass) {
00368       cm_msg(MERROR, "al_trigger_class", "Alarm class %s not found in ODB", alarm_class);
00369       return AL_INVALID_NAME;
00370    }
00371 
00372    size = sizeof(ac);
00373    status = db_get_record(hDB, hkeyclass, &ac, &size, 0);
00374    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00375       cm_msg(MERROR, "al_trigger_class", "Cannot get alarm class record");
00376       return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00377    }
00378 
00379    /* write system message */
00380    if (ac.write_system_message && (now - ac.system_message_last >= (DWORD)ac.system_message_interval)) {
00381       if (equal_ustring(alarm_class, "All"))
00382          sprintf(str, "General alarm: %s", alarm_message);
00383       else
00384          sprintf(str, "%s: %s", alarm_class, alarm_message);
00385       cm_msg(MTALK, "al_trigger_class", str);
00386       ac.system_message_last = now;
00387    }
00388 
00389    /* write elog message on first trigger if using internal ELOG */
00390    size = sizeof(url);
00391    if (ac.write_elog_message && first &&
00392        db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Elog/URL", url, &size, TID_STRING, FALSE) != DB_SUCCESS)
00393       el_submit(0, "Alarm system", "Alarm", "General", alarm_class, str,
00394                 "", "plain", "", "", 0, "", "", 0, "", "", 0, tag, 32);
00395 
00396    /* execute command */
00397    if (ac.execute_command[0] &&
00398        ac.execute_interval > 0 && (INT) ss_time() - (INT) ac.execute_last > ac.execute_interval) {
00399       if (equal_ustring(alarm_class, "All"))
00400          sprintf(str, "General alarm: %s", alarm_message);
00401       else
00402          sprintf(str, "%s: %s", alarm_class, alarm_message);
00403       sprintf(command, ac.execute_command, str);
00404       cm_msg(MINFO, "al_trigger_class", "Execute: %s", command);
00405       ss_system(command);
00406       ac.execute_last = ss_time();
00407    }
00408 
00409    /* stop run */
00410    if (ac.stop_run) {
00411       state = STATE_STOPPED;
00412       size = sizeof(state);
00413       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &state, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00414       if (state != STATE_STOPPED) {
00415          cm_msg(MINFO, "al_trigger_class", "Stopping the run from alarm class \'%s\', message \'%s\'", alarm_class, alarm_message);
00416          cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, NULL, 0, DETACH, FALSE);
00417       }
00418    }
00419 
00420    status = db_set_record(hDB, hkeyclass, &ac, sizeof(ac), 0);
00421    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00422       cm_msg(MERROR, "al_trigger_class", "Cannot update alarm class record");
00423       return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00424    }
00425 
00426    return AL_SUCCESS;
00427 }

00430 #endif                          /* DOXYGEN_SHOULD_SKIP_THIS */

00432 /********************************************************************/
00433 /**
00434 Reset (acknoledge) alarm.
00435 
00436 @param alarm_name Alarm name, defined in /alarms/alarms
00437 @return AL_SUCCESS, AL_RESETE, AL_INVALID_NAME
00438 */
00439 INT al_reset_alarm(const char *alarm_name)
00440 {
00441    int status, size, i;
00442    HNDLE hDB, hkeyalarm, hkeyclass, hsubkey;
00443    KEY key;
00444    char str[256];
00445    ALARM a;
00446    ALARM_CLASS ac;
00447 
00448    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00449 
00450    if (alarm_name == NULL) {
00451       /* reset all alarms */
00452       db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarms", &hkeyalarm);
00453       if (hkeyalarm) {
00454          for (i = 0;; i++) {
00455             db_enum_link(hDB, hkeyalarm, i, &hsubkey);
00456 
00457             if (!hsubkey)
00458                break;
00459 
00460             db_get_key(hDB, hsubkey, &key);
00461             al_reset_alarm(key.name);
00462          }
00463       }
00464       return AL_SUCCESS;
00465    }
00466 
00467    /* find alarm and alarm class */
00468    sprintf(str, "/Alarms/Alarms/%s", alarm_name);
00469    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkeyalarm);
00470    if (!hkeyalarm) {
00471       /*cm_msg(MERROR, "al_reset_alarm", "Alarm %s not found in ODB", alarm_name);*/
00472       return AL_INVALID_NAME;
00473    }
00474 
00475    size = sizeof(a);
00476    status = db_get_record(hDB, hkeyalarm, &a, &size, 0);
00477    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00478       cm_msg(MERROR, "al_reset_alarm", "Cannot get alarm record");
00479       return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00480    }
00481 
00482    sprintf(str, "/Alarms/Classes/%s", a.alarm_class);
00483    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkeyclass);
00484    if (!hkeyclass) {
00485       cm_msg(MERROR, "al_reset_alarm", "Alarm class %s not found in ODB", a.alarm_class);
00486       return AL_INVALID_NAME;
00487    }
00488 
00489    size = sizeof(ac);
00490    status = db_get_record(hDB, hkeyclass, &ac, &size, 0);
00491    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00492       cm_msg(MERROR, "al_reset_alarm", "Cannot get alarm class record");
00493       return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00494    }
00495 
00496    if (a.triggered) {
00497       a.triggered = 0;
00498       a.time_triggered_first[0] = 0;
00499       a.time_triggered_last[0] = 0;
00500       a.checked_last = 0;
00501 
00502       ac.system_message_last = 0;
00503       ac.execute_last = 0;
00504 
00505       status = db_set_record(hDB, hkeyalarm, &a, sizeof(a), 0);
00506       if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00507          cm_msg(MERROR, "al_reset_alarm", "Cannot update alarm record");
00508          return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00509       }
00510       status = db_set_record(hDB, hkeyclass, &ac, sizeof(ac), 0);
00511       if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00512          cm_msg(MERROR, "al_reset_alarm", "Cannot update alarm class record");
00513          return AL_ERROR_ODB;
00514       }
00515       return AL_RESET;
00516    }
00517 
00518    return AL_SUCCESS;
00519 }
00520 
00521 
00522 /********************************************************************/
00523 /**
00524 Scan ODB for alarms.
00525 @return AL_SUCCESS
00526 */
00527 INT al_check()
00528 {
00529    if (rpc_is_remote())
00530       return rpc_call(RPC_AL_CHECK);
00531 
00532 #ifdef LOCAL_ROUTINES
00533    {
00534       INT i, status, size, semaphore;
00535       HNDLE hDB, hkeyroot, hkey;
00536       KEY key;
00537       ALARM a;
00538       char str[256], value[256];
00539       time_t now;
00540       PROGRAM_INFO program_info;
00541       BOOL flag;
00542 
00543       ALARM_CLASS_STR(alarm_class_str);
00544       ALARM_ODB_STR(alarm_odb_str);
00545       ALARM_PERIODIC_STR(alarm_periodic_str);
00546 
00547       cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00548 
00549       if (hDB == 0)
00550          return AL_SUCCESS;     /* called from server not yet connected */
00551 
00552       /* check online mode */
00553       flag = TRUE;
00554       size = sizeof(flag);
00555       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Online Mode", &flag, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00556       if (!flag)
00557          return AL_SUCCESS;
00558 
00559       /* check global alarm flag */
00560       flag = TRUE;
00561       size = sizeof(flag);
00562       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarm system active", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00563       if (!flag)
00564          return AL_SUCCESS;
00565 
00566       /* request semaphore */
00567       cm_get_experiment_semaphore(&semaphore, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00568       status = ss_semaphore_wait_for(semaphore, 100);
00569       if (status != SS_SUCCESS)
00570          return SUCCESS;        /* someone else is doing alarm business */
00571 
00572       /* check ODB alarms */
00573       db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarms", &hkeyroot);
00574       if (!hkeyroot) {
00575          /* create default ODB alarm */
00576          status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarms/Demo ODB", strcomb(alarm_odb_str));
00577          db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarms", &hkeyroot);
00578          if (!hkeyroot) {
00579             ss_semaphore_release(semaphore);
00580             return SUCCESS;
00581          }
00582 
00583          status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarms/Demo periodic", strcomb(alarm_periodic_str));
00584          db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarms", &hkeyroot);
00585          if (!hkeyroot) {
00586             ss_semaphore_release(semaphore);
00587             return SUCCESS;
00588          }
00589 
00590          /* create default alarm classes */
00591          status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Classes/Alarm", strcomb(alarm_class_str));
00592          status = db_create_record(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Classes/Warning", strcomb(alarm_class_str));
00593          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00594             ss_semaphore_release(semaphore);
00595             return SUCCESS;
00596          }
00597       }
00598 
00599       for (i = 0;; i++) {
00600          status = db_enum_key(hDB, hkeyroot, i, &hkey);
00601          if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
00602             break;
00603 
00604          db_get_key(hDB, hkey, &key);
00605 
00606          size = sizeof(a);
00607          status = db_get_record(hDB, hkey, &a, &size, 0);
00608          if (status != DB_SUCCESS || a.type < 1 || a.type > AT_LAST) {
00609             /* make sure alarm record has right structure */
00610             db_check_record(hDB, hkey, "", strcomb(alarm_odb_str), TRUE);
00611             size = sizeof(a);
00612             status = db_get_record(hDB, hkey, &a, &size, 0);
00613             if (status != DB_SUCCESS || a.type < 1 || a.type > AT_LAST) {
00614                cm_msg(MERROR, "al_check", "Cannot get alarm record");
00615                continue;
00616             }
00617          }
00618 
00619          /* check periodic alarm only when active */
00620          if (a.active &&
00621              a.type == AT_PERIODIC &&
00622              a.check_interval > 0 && (INT) ss_time() - (INT) a.checked_last > a.check_interval) {
00623             /* if checked_last has not been set, set it to current time */
00624             if (a.checked_last == 0) {
00625                a.checked_last = ss_time();
00626                db_set_record(hDB, hkey, &a, size, 0);
00627             } else
00628                al_trigger_alarm(key.name, a.alarm_message, a.alarm_class, "", AT_PERIODIC);
00629          }
00630 
00631          /* check alarm only when active and not internal */
00632          if (a.active &&
00633              a.type == AT_EVALUATED &&
00634              a.check_interval > 0 && (INT) ss_time() - (INT) a.checked_last > a.check_interval) {
00635             /* if condition is true, trigger alarm */
00636             if (al_evaluate_condition(a.condition, value)) {
00637                sprintf(str, a.alarm_message, value);
00638                al_trigger_alarm(key.name, str, a.alarm_class, "", AT_EVALUATED);
00639             } else {
00640                a.checked_last = ss_time();
00641                status = db_set_record(hDB, hkey, &a, sizeof(a), 0);
00642                if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00643                   cm_msg(MERROR, "al_check", "Cannot write back alarm record");
00644                   continue;
00645                }
00646             }
00647          }
00648       }
00649 
00650       /* check /programs alarms */
00651       db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Programs", &hkeyroot);
00652       if (hkeyroot) {
00653          for (i = 0;; i++) {
00654             status = db_enum_key(hDB, hkeyroot, i, &hkey);
00655             if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
00656                break;
00657 
00658             db_get_key(hDB, hkey, &key);
00659 
00660             /* don't check "execute on xxx" */
00661             if (key.type != TID_KEY)
00662                continue;
00663 
00664             size = sizeof(program_info);
00665             status = db_get_record(hDB, hkey, &program_info, &size, 0);
00666             if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00667                cm_msg(MERROR, "al_check", "Cannot get program info record");
00668                continue;
00669             }
00670 
00671             now = ss_time();
00672 
00673             rpc_get_name(str);
00674             str[strlen(key.name)] = 0;
00675             if (!equal_ustring(str, key.name) && cm_exist(key.name, FALSE) == CM_NO_CLIENT) {
00676                if (program_info.first_failed == 0)
00677                   program_info.first_failed = (DWORD) now;
00678 
00679                /* fire alarm when not running for more than what specified in check interval */
00680                if (now - program_info.first_failed >= program_info.check_interval / 1000) {
00681                   /* if not running and alarm calss defined, trigger alarm */
00682                   if (program_info.alarm_class[0]) {
00683                      sprintf(str, "Program %s is not running", key.name);
00684                      al_trigger_alarm(key.name, str, program_info.alarm_class,
00685                                       "Program not running", AT_PROGRAM);
00686                   }
00687 
00688                   /* auto restart program */
00689                   if (program_info.auto_restart && program_info.start_command[0]) {
00690                      ss_system(program_info.start_command);
00691                      program_info.first_failed = 0;
00692                      cm_msg(MTALK, "al_check", "Program %s restarted", key.name);
00693                   }
00694                }
00695             } else
00696                program_info.first_failed = 0;
00697 
00698             db_set_record(hDB, hkey, &program_info, sizeof(program_info), 0);
00699          }
00700       }
00701 
00702       ss_semaphore_release(semaphore);
00703    }
00704 #endif                          /* LOCAL_COUTINES */
00705 
00706    return SUCCESS;
00707 }
00708 
00709 /********************************************************************/
00710 /**
00711  Scan ODB for alarms.
00712  @return AL_SUCCESS
00713  */
00714 INT al_get_alarms(char *result, int result_size)
00715 {
00716    HNDLE hDB, hkey, hsubkey;
00717    int i, j, n, flag, size;
00718    char alarm_class[32], msg[256], value_str[256], str[256];
00719    
00720    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00721    result[0] = 0;
00722    n = 0;
00723    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarms", &hkey);
00724    if (hkey) {
00725       /* check global alarm flag */
00726       flag = TRUE;
00727       size = sizeof(flag);
00728       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarm System active", &flag, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00729       if (flag) {
00730          for (i = 0;; i++) {
00731             db_enum_link(hDB, hkey, i, &hsubkey);
00732             
00733             if (!hsubkey)
00734                break;
00735             
00736             size = sizeof(flag);
00737             db_get_value(hDB, hsubkey, "Triggered", &flag, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00738             if (flag) {
00739                n++;
00740                
00741                size = sizeof(alarm_class);
00742                db_get_value(hDB, hsubkey, "Alarm Class", alarm_class, &size, TID_STRING,
00743                             TRUE);
00744                
00745                               
00746                size = sizeof(msg);
00747                db_get_value(hDB, hsubkey, "Alarm Message", msg, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00748                
00749                size = sizeof(j);
00750                db_get_value(hDB, hsubkey, "Type", &j, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00751                
00752                if (j == AT_EVALUATED) {
00753                   size = sizeof(str);
00754                   db_get_value(hDB, hsubkey, "Condition", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00755                   
00756                   /* retrieve value */
00757                   al_evaluate_condition(str, value_str);
00758                   sprintf(str, msg, value_str);
00759                } else
00760                   strlcpy(str, msg, sizeof(str));
00761 
00762                strlcat(result, alarm_class, result_size);
00763                strlcat(result, ": ", result_size);
00764                strlcat(result, str, result_size);
00765                strlcat(result, "\n", result_size);
00766             }
00767          }
00768       }
00769    }
00770    
00771    return n;
00772 }
00773
